FAQs

Where is the wedding?

Both the ceremony and reception are being held at One Marylebone, 1 Marylebone Road, London, NW1 4AQ. The venue is a 1-minute walk from Great Portland Street underground station (Circle, Metropolitan and Hammersmith & City lines) and a 3-minute walk from Regent's Park underground station (Bakerloo line). It is 10 minutes by taxi from King's Cross, Euston and Paddington train stations.

When should I arrive?

Yaz will be walking down the aisle at 4:00pm! So please make sure to get to the venue for 3:30pm.

When does the party end?

1:00am.

What is the itinerary for the day?

  • 3:30pm: Guests arrive
  • 4:00pm: Wedding ceremony
  • 4:30pm: Drinks reception
  • 6:00pm: Dinner and speeches
  • 8:30pm: Dancing
  • 1:00am: Carriages

When should I RSVP by?

Please RSVP by 1st May 2025.

What's the dress code?

Lounge suits and chic attire. We're thinking semi-formal and elegant.

Is any of the wedding day being held outside?

The whole day will be indoors. So no need to worry about the rain.

Where can I stay nearby?

The venue has discounted rates with the following nearby hotels: Melia White House and Treehouse London. Please get in touch with us if you would like to take advantage of their discount.

Am I allowed to bring a plus one?

Unfortunately, we don't have space for guests to bring plus ones.

Will children be attending the wedding?

In order to allow parents a well-deserved evening off, we have chosen for our wedding day to be an adult-only occasion. We hope this advance notice means you are still able to attend and will enjoy having the evening off!

Will there be meal options for guests with dietary restrictions or allergies?

Yes, please include details of your dietary requirements in the RSVP form on this website.

Am I allowed to take photos at your wedding?

Throughout the day you are welcome to take pictures, except for during the wedding ceremony when we ask that you keep phones and cameras switched off. Our wedding photographer will still be taking snaps though!

Can I get you a gift?

We're thrilled that you're coming to celebrate with us, and your presence is present enough! But, if you would like to buy us a gift, we have a list of options on Prezola
